name: John DOE, James C. Young, Michael A. Sherred, Maurice A. Styles, and All Other Similarly Situated Inmates in the Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellants v. Commissioner Colonel Frank PAWLOWSKI, Pennsylvania State Police, Appellee

parties: John DOE, James C. Young, Michael A. Sherred, Maurice A. Styles, and All Other Similarly Situated Inmates in the Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellants v. Commissioner Colonel Frank PAWLOWSKI, Pennsylvania State Police, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of June, 2010, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
997 A.2d 1150
John DOE, James C. Young, Michael A. Sherred, Maurice A. Styles, and All Other Similarly Situated Inmates in the Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellants v. Commissioner Colonel Frank PAWLOWSKI, Pennsylvania State Police, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 21, 2010.
